languages.text: "Человек, о котором я упомянул — не шпион, а секретарь при департаменте Администратума на мире Даргонус. Его статус был известен и губернатору планеты, и Теодоре. В его обязанности входит исполнение священного долга перед Золотым Троном — изничтожение угроз Империуму, которых предостаточно в Просторе Коронус".

"The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."
languages.original_text: "Человек, о котором я упомянул — не шпион, а секретарь при департаменте Администратума на мире Даргонус. Его статус был известен и губернатору планеты, и Теодоре. В его обязанности входит исполнение священного долга перед Золотым Троном — изничтожение угроз Империуму, которых предостаточно в Просторе Коронус".

His duty is to fulfill the sacred oath before Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

languages.text: «La persona de la que hablo no es ningún espía, sino un secretario del departamento del Administratum en Dargonus. El gobernador del planeta y Theodora eran plenamente conscientes de su estatus. Su deber es cumplir su juramento sagrado al Trono Dorado y eliminar amenazas al Imperium, algo que abunda en la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

traits.locale_text: «La persona de la que hablo no es ningún espía, sino un secretario del departamento del Administratum en Dargonus. El gobernador del planeta y Theodora eran plenamente conscientes de su estatus. Su deber es cumplir su juramento sagrado al Trono Dorado y eliminar amenazas al Imperium, algo que abunda en la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: “我提到的那个人并不是间谍，而是达戈努斯行政部门的秘书。那颗行星的总督以及西奥多拉本人都很清楚他的身份。他的职责是履行对黄金王座的神圣誓言，消灭一切帝国的威胁，而科罗努斯扩区有很多这样的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

traits.locale_text: “我提到的那个人并不是间谍，而是达戈努斯行政部门的秘书。那颗行星的总督以及西奥多拉本人都很清楚他的身份。他的职责是履行对黄金王座的神圣誓言，消灭一切帝国的威胁，而科罗努斯星域有很多这样的威胁。”

languages.text: 「さっき話した人物はスパイではなく、ダルゴナスの行政局の秘書です。惑星の総督とシオドーラは秘書の件を十二分に心得ていました。あれの任務は黄金の玉座への聖なる誓いを果たし、コロヌス・エクスパンスに五万とある帝国への脅威を排除することです」
languages.original_text: "The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

traits.locale_text: 「さっき話した人物はスパイではなく、ダルゴナスの行政局の秘書です。惑星の総督とシオドーラは秘書の件を十二分に心得ていました。あれの任務は黄金の玉座への聖なる誓いを果たし、コロヌス・エクスパンスに五万とある帝国への脅威を排除することです」

languages.text: "Die von mir erwähnte Person ist kein Spion, sondern ein Sekretär des Adeptus Administratum auf Dargonus. Der Gouverneur des Planeten und Theodora waren über seinen Status vollständig im Bilde. Er hat die Pflicht, seinen heiligen Eid auf den Goldenen Thron zu erfüllen und alle Gefahren für das Imperium zu eliminieren, die es in der Koronus-Ausdehnung im Übermaß gibt."
languages.original_text: "The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

traits.locale_text: "Die von mir erwähnte Person ist kein Spion, sondern ein Sekretär des Adeptus Administratum auf Dargonus. Der Gouverneur des Planeten und Theodora waren über seinen Status vollständig im Bilde. Er hat die Pflicht, seinen heiligen Eid auf den Goldenen Thron zu erfüllen und alle Gefahren für das Imperium zu eliminieren, die es in der Koronus Expanse im Übermaß gibt."

languages.text: « La personne dont j'ai parlé n'est pas un espion, mais un secrétaire du département de l'Administratum sur Dargonus. Le gouverneur de la planète et Théodora avaient parfaitement conscience de son statut. Comme le veut son serment sacré envers le Trône d'Or, il a pour devoir d'éliminer les menaces qui pèsent sur l'Imperium, ce qui ne manque pas dans les Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

traits.locale_text: « La personne dont j'ai parlé n'est pas un espion, mais un secrétaire du département de l'Administratum sur Dargonus. Le gouverneur de la planète et Théodora avaient parfaitement conscience de son statut. Comme le veut son serment sacré envers le Trône d'Or, il a pour devoir d'éliminer les menaces qui pèsent sur l'Imperium, ce qui ne manque pas dans les Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: "Sözünü ettiğim kişi casus değil, Dargonus'taki Administratum departmanındaki yazmanlardan biri. Gezegenin valisi ile Theodora, kendisinden haberdardı. Görevi, Altın Taht'a ettiği kutsal yemini yerine getirmek ve İmparatorluk'a yönelik tehditleri ortadan kaldırmaktır. Bunlardan da Koronus Enginliği'nde bol bol var tabii."
languages.original_text: "The person I mentioned is not a spy but a secretary in the Administratum department on Dargonus. The planet's governor and Theodora were fully aware of his status. His duty is to fulfil the sacred oath to the Golden Throne and eliminate threats to the Imperium, which the Koronus Expanse has in abundance."

traits.locale_text: "Sözünü ettiğim kişi bir casus değil, Dargonus'taki Administratum departmanındaki bir sekreter. Gezegenin valisi ve Theodora, kendisinin durumundan haberdardı. Görevi Altın Taht'a ettiği kutsal yemini yerine getirmek ve İmparatorluk'a yönelik tehditleri ortadan kaldırmaktır, ki onlardan Koronus Enginliği'nde bol bol var elbette."
